title: Dusk Blade of Lich King WoW boss Hard Mode 5000<--- new name

embed.description: Duskblade of Draktharr Stats Passive Recipe Menu Duskblade of Draktharr is a legendary item in League of Legends.

replies.body:
it's not even that broken....

it has an entire 2 minute cooldown.  when it's on cooldown... that's stats on it is minimal.

> [{quoted}](name=LuciferDraco,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rMuUrIfl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-16T11:23:57.762+0000)

> it's not even that broken....
> 
> it has an entire 2 minute cooldown.  when it's on cooldown... that's stats on it is minimal.

In what world is 75 ad 10 arp and 5% move speed minimal

because there are other items with basically the same stats {{item:3156}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3139}} ..give or take a few stat differences.
All with an active far shorter than 2 minutes, and one that you can control when it activates
